mapper.insert:
insert into method_call ( uuid, start_commit_id, body_type, body_uuid, package_name, class_name, signature, raw_method_uuid, repo_uuid ) VALUES
( #{item.uuid}, #{commonInfo.commit}, #{item.bodyType}, #{item.bodyUuid}, #{item.packageName}, #{item.className}, #{item.signature}, #{item.rawMethodUuid}, #{commonInfo.repoUuid} )
